name: Rammus
subtitle: the Armordillo
description: Idolized by many, dismissed by some, mystifying to all, the curious being Rammus is an enigma. Protected by a spiked shell, he inspires increasingly disparate theories on his origin wherever he goes—from demigod, to sacred oracle, to a mere beast transformed by magic. Whatever the truth may be, Rammus keeps his own counsel and stops for no one as he roams the Shuriman desert.

abilities.name: Spiked Shell
abilities.description: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

abilities.name: Powerball
abilities.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

abilities.name: Defensive Ball Curl
abilities.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him.

abilities.name: Frenzying Taunt
abilities.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
